activities: Zerion services business customers and therefore does not collect information from consumers or individuals as a regular part of its business.  Zerion may process certain personal data from individuals who own or work at customer businesses.  Zerion's collection of personal data is limited.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe.  Zerion participates in TRUSTe's Watchdog Dispute Resolution program, which will ensure that each individual's complaint is investigated and resolved by reference to principles and damages awarded where the applicable law provides.
